A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is one of the best Star Wars movies ever. Everything is perfect besides the casting of Kelly Marie Tran\, who did not deliver her lines with effectiveness\, or at least enough sincerity. John Boyega is excellent in making Finn likable. Rian Johnson deserves a nomination for best writer at least. The color schemes of the lightsaber duel in the third act was phenomenal. Overall\, an excellent addition.
